## ProgramBuilder.struct() method

Creates a structure type variable

**Signature:**

```typescript
struct(structName: string, instanceName: string): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  structName | string | Name of the structure type |
|  instanceName | string | Name of the variable |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

the created variable
